changeSet.author: Anton Shtabnoy
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `User` ( `userid` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `firstname` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `lastname` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `password` varchar(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`userid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

changeSet.author: Anton Shtabnoy
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `Provider` ( `providerid` int(11) NOT NULL, `address` varchar(64) NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`providerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
